alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Grant; Hot Spring (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 6:55PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Grant, northwestern Dallas and southeastern Hot Spring Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 655 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles west of Leola, or 14 miles south of Malvern, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leola... Prattsville... Poyen... Jenkins Ferry State Park... Thiel... Dogwood... Lono... Willow... Brush Creek... Buie... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Little Rock. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central and southwestern Arkansas.
